author: Babita Ram
text:
What a piece of sh** you are, stooping so low for a game.
That cold mess you were talking about is in your head. 
Be careful about your so called manifestation, you just might manifest it in your life.
"As you sow, so shall you reap" https://t.co/bJ2gx6KlmI

author: Babita Ram
text:
You are talking to someone who has done fantastic work in her career. She is thriving and will keep thriving in her career and life 🧿🙏

But look at you, a looser, jiske paas baat karne ki tameez nahi aur na hi sahi galat ka sense. https://t.co/ZFMtHw1O4u

author: Babita Ram
text: beautiful you and the picture ❤️ https://t.co/vtc17auNo5
